Class.name: EasyCSP.Network.EmailAttachment
Class.Description: Describe and hold the contents of an email attachment

Property.name: holdFile
Property.Description: If the attachment lives in an MV DIR-type hold file save the MV VOC name of that hold file here.

Property.name: itemId
Property.Description: The key to the attachment contents.

Property.name: name
Property.Description: The name the attachment will be given when it is embedded in the email

Method.name: Setextension
Method.Implementation: if $extract(value, 1, 1) '= "." set value = "."_value set i%extension = value set i%mimeType = ##class(EasyCSP.Models.MIMETypes).getType(value)

Property.name: mimeType
Property.Description: The attachment MIME type. This is determined by using the extension as a key to the MIME types global

Method.name: GetmimeType
asMailMessagePart
Method.Implementation:
set rtn = ##class(%Net.MailMessagePart).%New()
do rtn.TextData.CopyFrom(..content) set rtn.Charset = "utf-8" set rtn.ContentTransferEncoding = "base64" set rtn.ContentType = ..mimeType do rtn.SetHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename="""_..name_..extension_"""")
do ..content.Rewind() while (..content.AtEnd = 0) { set len = 32768 do rtn.Body.Write(..content.Read(.len)) }
quit rtn

Method.name: generateBoundaryKey
Method.Implementation: RandomNumber = DTX( @ME->Now() : RND( 65535 ) ) InnerBoundary = "%SYSTEM.Encryption"->Base64Encode( RandomNumber : @ME->name ) InnerBoundaryFlag = '--' : InnerBoundary
